choose.helpText: will pick something for you between a list of things. Separate different items with a comma and space (e.g. `choose A, B, C`).
choose.shortHelp: selects an item from a list of options.

server.helpText: used to show information about the server, including the owner, region, member count, and server age.

help.helpText: gives a description and usage for a specific command (e.g. `help daily`).

ping.helpText: shows the latency between the bot server and Discord.

qr.helpText: produces a QR code in PNG format from user input. (e.g. `qr https://www.google.com`).

version.helpText: shows the current running version of Fire Keeper, as well as some additional information.

weather.helpText: gives a local weather report for the day. Specify a city or zip code after the command (e.g. `weather San Diego`).
weather.shortHelp: gives a weather report for a city/zip code.
